prompts: Create a quirky poison-type Pokemon with a round shape and a smiling face.
Imagine a Pokemon that floats in the air and has a purple color scheme.
Generate a unique creature that spreads toxic gas in urban environments.
Design a playful Pokemon that can be found in caves and mountains.
Make a small, round Pokemon with a cheerful expression and a hint of danger.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of pollution but still looks cute.
I want a Pokemon that can evolve into something more menacing from a basic form.
